<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Interface to help hash various types through a hasher type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Via provided specializations of &#96;add&#96;, &#96;addRange&#96;, and &#96;addRangeElements&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// functions, various types (e.g. &#96;ArrayRef&#96;, &#96;StringRef&#96;, etc.) can be hashed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// without requiring any knowledge of hashed types from the hasher type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The only method expected from the templated hasher type &#96;HasherT&#96; is:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42; void update(ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt; Data)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Additionally, the following methods will be forwarded to the hasher type:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42; decltype(std::declval&lt;HasherT &amp;&gt;().final()) final()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42; decltype(std::declval&lt;HasherT &amp;&gt;().result()) result()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// From a user point of view, the interface provides the following:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42; &#96;template&lt;typename T&gt; add(const T &amp;Value)&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   The &#96;add&#96; function implements hashing of various types.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42; &#96;template &lt;typename ItT&gt; void addRange(ItT First, ItT Last)&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   The &#96;addRange&#96; function is designed to aid hashing a range of values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   It explicitly adds the size of the range in the hash.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42; &#96;template &lt;typename ItT&gt; void addRangeElements(ItT First, ItT Last)&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   The &#96;addRangeElements&#96; function is also designed to aid hashing a range of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   values. In contrast to &#96;addRange&#96;, it &#42;&#42;ignores&#42;&#42; the size of the range,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   behaving as if elements were added one at a time with &#96;add&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// User-defined &#96;struct&#96; types can participate in this interface by providing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// an &#96;addHash&#96; templated function. See the associated template specialization</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// for details.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This interface does not impose requirements on the hasher</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;update(ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt; Data)&#96; method. We want to avoid collisions for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// variable-size types; for example for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// builder.add(&#123;1&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// builder.add(&#123;2, 3&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// builder.add(&#123;1, 2&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// builder.add(&#123;3&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// . Thus, specializations of &#96;add&#96; and &#96;addHash&#96; for variable-size types must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// not assume that the hasher type considers the size as part of the hash; they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// must explicitly add the size to the hash. See for example specializations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// for &#96;ArrayRef&#96; and &#96;StringRef&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Additionally, since types are eventually forwarded to the hasher&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;void update(ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;)&#96; method, endianness plays a role in the hash</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// computation (for example when computing &#96;add((int)123)&#96;).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Specifiying a non-&#96;native&#96; &#96;Endianness&#96; template parameter allows to compute</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// stable hash across platforms with different endianness.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasherT, llvm::endianness Endianness&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hashbuilder"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hashbuilder/#a3790ea10d4f6d2364d6b1fb2bddfbf4e">HashBuilder</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hashbuilderbase/#abc0798b909ab86d9724d67362a53946e">HashBuilderBase</a>&lt;HasherT&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">decltype</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(addHash(std::declval&lt;HashBuilder &amp;&gt;(), std::declval&lt;T &amp;&gt;()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Implement hashing for user-defined &#96;struct&#96;s.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Any user-define &#96;struct&#96; can participate in hashing via &#96;HashBuilder&#96; by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// providing a &#96;addHash&#96; templated function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// template &lt;typename HasherT, llvm::endianness Endianness&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// void addHash(HashBuilder&lt;HasherT, Endianness&gt; &amp;HBuilder,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///              const UserDefinedStruct &amp;Value);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// struct SimpleStruct &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   char c;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   int i;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// template &lt;typename HasherT, llvm::endianness Endianness&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// void addHash(HashBuilder&lt;HasherT, Endianness&gt; &amp;HBuilder,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///              const SimpleStruct &amp;Value) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   HBuilder.add(Value.c);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   HBuilder.add(Value.i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// To avoid endianness issues, specializations of &#96;addHash&#96; should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// generally rely on exising &#96;add&#96;, &#96;addRange&#96;, and &#96;addRangeElements&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// functions. If directly using &#96;update&#96;, an implementation must correctly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// handle endianness.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// struct &#95;&#95;attribute&#95;&#95; ((packed)) StructWithFastHash &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   int I;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   char C;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   // If possible, we want to hash both &#96;I&#96; and &#96;C&#96; in a single</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   // &#96;update&#96; call for performance concerns.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   template &lt;typename HasherT, llvm::endianness Endianness&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   friend void addHash(HashBuilder&lt;HasherT, Endianness&gt; &amp;HBuilder,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                       const StructWithFastHash &amp;Value) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     if (Endianness == llvm::endianness::native) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       HBuilder.update(ArrayRef(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///           reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;const uint8&#95;t &#42;&gt;(&amp;Value), sizeof(Value)));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     &#125; else &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       // Rely on existing &#96;add&#96; methods to handle endianness.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       HBuilder.add(Value.I);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       HBuilder.add(Value.C);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// To avoid collisions, specialization of &#96;addHash&#96; for variable-size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// types must take the size into account.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// struct CustomContainer &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// private:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   size&#95;t Size;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   int Elements&#91;100&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// public:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   CustomContainer(size&#95;t Size) : Size(Size) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     for (size&#95;t I = 0; I != Size; ++I)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       Elements&#91;I&#93; = I;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   template &lt;typename HasherT, llvm::endianness Endianness&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   friend void addHash(HashBuilder&lt;HasherT, Endianness&gt; &amp;HBuilder,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                       const CustomContainer &amp;Value) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     if (Endianness == llvm::endianness::native) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       HBuilder.update(ArrayRef(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///           reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;const uint8&#95;t &#42;&gt;(&amp;Value.Size),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///           sizeof(Value.Size) + Value.Size &#42; sizeof(Value.Elements&#91;0&#93;)));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     &#125; else &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       // &#96;addRange&#96; will take care of encoding the size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       HBuilder.addRange(&amp;Value.Elements&#91;0&#93;, &amp;Value.Elements&#91;0&#93; +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       Value.Size);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt;</span></CodeLine>
